title: I need help finding the name of a band with the only info being the logo. Can anyone help? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just a suggestion.. use a smartphone. Take a picture of this logo. Make sure the logo fills the picture, so it's the logo and nothing around it. Then go on Google, to Images, the search images. It will ask if you want to insert an image or upload one. Select upload, it will take you to your phones picture gallery, tap your pic of the logo, select open, and Google will come back with that image several times over with text from whatever internet page it came from.
There was a band in the 1980s called FREUR whose name was just their logo. They released a single called DOOT DOOT.
